LanguageData.darkenergy.label: Contained Dark Energy
LanguageData.darkenergy.description: A container holding the pure essence of dark energy, a mixture of science and magic. Used to make dark matter.
LanguageData.darkmatter.label: Contained Dark Matter
LanguageData.darkmatter.description: A container holding pure dark matter, the material of the most destructive qualities.
LanguageData.DarkSteel.label: Dark Steel
LanguageData.DarkSteel.description: A metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
LanguageData.DarkSteel_Black.label: Black Dark Steel
LanguageData.DarkSteel_Black.description: A blackish version of the metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
LanguageData.DarkSteel_Darkened.label: Darkened Dark Steel
LanguageData.DarkSteel_Darkened.description: A metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
LanguageData.DarkSteel_Gold.label: Golden Dark Steel
LanguageData.DarkSteel_Gold.description: A golden version of the metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
LanguageData.DarkSteel_Marble.label: Marbled Dark Steel
LanguageData.DarkSteel_Marble.description: A marble looking version of the metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
LanguageData.DarkSteel_White.label: White Dark Steel
LanguageData.DarkSteel_White.description: A white version of the metalic material of unequal quality, made from plasteel and dark matter.
